items.name: Multiattack
entries: The medusa makes either three melee attacks—one with its snake hair, one to constrict, and one with its shortsword—or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

items.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the medusa can't constrict another target.
